portfolio

Class Investment

  • java.lang.Object
    • portfolio.Investment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutualFund, Stock

    public abstract class Investment
extends java.lang.Object
    Investment Class has six instance variables which define every investment in this project. Investment class contains the getters and setters methods that are used by all its child classes, Stock and MutualFund. Setters and constructors now throw custom exceptions Possess a few abstract methods that are defined later in its child classes Also has equals and toString method that overrides and is overridden Date: November 29th, 2017

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Investment.ExFive
      Child class of Exception, and implements the exception thrown for an invalid book value input
      class  Investment.ExFour
      Child class of Exception, and implements the exception thrown for an invalid price field
      class  Investment.ExOne
      Child class of Exception, and implements the exception thrown for an invalid symbol field
      class  Investment.ExSix
      Child class of Exception, and implements the exception thrown for an invalid gain
      class  Investment.ExThree
      Child class of Exception, and implements the exception thrown for an invalid quantity field
      class  Investment.ExTwo
      Child class of Exception, and implements the exception thrown for an invalid Name field
